scripts.install-dart-deps: cd lib && dart pub get && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run soiac && cd lib && dart analyze && cd ..
scripts.run:snippets: npm run build && dart run bin/snippets.dart
scripts.run:reflection: npm run build && dart run bin/reflection.dart
scripts.run:start-service: npm run build && dart run bin/start_service.dart
scripts.run:call-service: npm run build && dart run bin/call_service.dart
